title: It’s more than 5 to 7 days, why haven't I received my refund? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
Apologies! Now that’s not the kind of experience we aim to deliver.
Ideally, you should’ve received the refund amount by now.
We suggest you glance through your updated bank/source statement thoroughly, if you’re unable to locate the refund amount, kindly initiate a LIVE CHAT with us and we'd leave no stone unturned to sort this out for you.
